QuestData.Title: To the Chamber of Incineration!
QuestData.Description: It was an ambush, $n! As soon as we walked in a super-fat ogre named Rom'ogg Bonecrusher attacked us! Raz bravely defended me while I ran off to hide. I watched as they beat him unconscious and then dragged him to a place the fat one called the "Chamber of Incineration." I think it's just down the hall across the bridge.$B$BI'm too scared to go any further. Take my all-purpose diving helm and search for Raz. I'll communicate with you through the helm.$B$BAnd if you find that ogre, kill him!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This is the fat piece of good-for-nothing that kidnapped Raz.
QuestData.RewardText: <Finkle's helm crackles with static.>$B$BRAZ! What have they done to him!? FOLLOW HIM!
